deactivateAllFragments() - Method in class controllers.UIController
When called, all Fragment instances registered will be deactivated, meaning no update ticks will be dispatched, and the fragment will not be painted

destroyPickups() - Method in class controllers.EntityController
Destroys all entities that have been queued to be removed
DirectGhostEntity - Class in entity.ghost
The DirectGhostEntity is a ghost that directly follows the Pacman as efficiently as possible - It attempts to find the shortest path to the player.
